data_description.phuong_thuc: Choose how to add EVN customer code

auto.title: 🤖 Automatic Setup

data_description.username: Select customer code from available list
data_description.ngaydauky: Select billing cycle start day (usually day 1-28)

auto.description:
### 🤖 Automatic Setup

✅ Found data from EVN VN Addon
📊 Data source: EVN VN Addon Database
🔄 Sync: Auto update from addon

**Select customer code and billing start day:**

manual.title: ✏️ Manual Setup

data_description.username: Enter your customer code from EVN electricity bill
data_description.ngaydauky: Select billing cycle start day (usually day 1-28)

manual.description:
### ✏️ Manual Setup

📝 **Enter EVN Customer Code**
🔍 **Format**: Must start with P or S, minimum 11 characters
💫 **Smart Preview**: Data will show after validation succeeds

**Enter information:**

data_description.back: Go back to select different customer code or billing day
Go back to modify customer code or billing day

abort.already_configured:
🔄 Customer code already configured!

✅ **Customer code `{title}` already exists in system**

🎯 **Your options:**
• **Edit settings**: Go to *Configuration* → *Reset billing start day*
• **Remove and recreate**: Delete old customer code before adding new one
• **Use different code**: Enter another customer code

💡 *Each customer code can only be configured once*

error.invalid_evn_code:
❌ Invalid customer code!

✅ Correct format:
• Must start with P or S
• Must have at least 11 characters
• Example: PE06800012345
error.customer_not_found:
🔍 Customer code not found!

❗ Possible reasons:
• Incorrect customer code entered
• EVN VN Addon error
• EVN VN Addon still fetching data

💬 Please check again or contact admin
